title: "HED"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# read csv file to tibble
hed_df <- read_csv("human-edit-dist.csv")
hed_df
```

```{r}
# string to tibble with a column of characters
str_to_tibble <- function(str) {
  str_split(str, "") %>% 
    unlist() %>% 
    tibble(char = .)
}
```

```{r}
str_to_tibble(hed_df$seg1[1])
```
